html: Equality doesn't stop with marriage. That's why my colleagues & I introduced the Fair and Equal Housing Act to ensure that LGBTQ Americans are protected under the landmark Fair Housing Act. No one should face housing discrimination because of who they love or how they identify.pic.twitter.com/4VHoad1NBV
text:

html: I visited Great Country Farms for the fourth stop of my agricultural tour of #VA10. We discussed their Community Supported Agriculture program, and I learned about the sustainable farming practices they promote. Thank you for the warm welcome, @TheFarmerSays!pic.twitter.com/ZXfvVM2lQQ

html: Barbara Johns was a trailblazer for justice & equality in our Commonwealth. At just 15 years-old, she led a walkout in protest of school segregation. Her bravery led to the landmark Brown v. Board decision that declared segregation illegal. Happy #BarbaraJohnsDay, Virginia!pic.twitter.com/oeYx04OzeT
text:
Barbara Johns was a trailblazer for justice & equality in our Commonwealth.

At just 15 years-old, she led a walkout in protest of school segregation. Her bravery led to the landmark Brown v. Board decision that declared segregation illegal.

Happy #BarbaraJohnsDay, Virginia!pic.twitter.com/oeYx04OzeT

html: Lawful cannabis businesses operate with cash only, making them vulnerable to crime. The #SAFEBankingAct addresses this public safety concern by allowing these businesses access to the banking system. Congratulations @RepPerlmutter on its passage through @FSCDems today!pic.twitter.com/q3JcUDEJaO – at Rayburn House Office Building
text:
Lawful cannabis businesses operate with cash only, making them vulnerable to crime. The #SAFEBankingAct addresses this public safety concern by allowing these businesses access to the banking system. 

Congratulations @RepPerlmutter on its passage through @FSCDems today!pic.twitter.com/q3JcUDEJaO – at Rayburn House Office Building

html: Here’s what my first bill, the FinCEN Improvement Act will do: Add combating domestic terrorism to FinCEN's mission Promote a focus on emerging methods of illicit finance, like cryptocurrencies Ensure partnership with Tribal law enforcement Read it for yourself here:pic.twitter.com/WuGaPBdN0k
text:

 Add combating domestic terrorism to FinCEN's mission

Ensure partnership with Tribal law enforcement

html: Over time, the national memorial will serve as a report on which parts of the country have confronted the truth of this terror and which have not. Here are the photos of the monuments that represent counties in Virginia’s 10th Congressional district.pic.twitter.com/wqZYUlY1p1
text:
Over time, the national memorial will serve as a report on which parts of the country have confronted the truth of this terror and which have not.

Here are the photos of the monuments that represent counties in Virginia’s 10th Congressional district.pic.twitter.com/wqZYUlY1p1

html: The memorial is more than a static monument. In the six-acre park surrounding the memorial is a field of identical monuments, waiting to be claimed and installed in the counties they represent.
text: The memorial is more than a static monument. In the six-acre park surrounding the memorial is a field of identical monuments, waiting to be claimed and installed in the counties they represent.

html: The names of the lynching victims are engraved on the columns. Nearly the entire inner courtyard of the memorial is filled with columns representing almost 50 Virginia counties where at least one lynching has been documented.
text: The names of the lynching victims are engraved on the columns. Nearly the entire inner courtyard of the memorial is filled with columns representing almost 50 Virginia counties where at least one lynching has been documented.

html: Set upon six acres, the site includes a memorial square with 800 six-foot monuments to symbolize thousands of racial terror lynching victims in the United States and the counties and states where this terrorism took place.pic.twitter.com/dxBOSePhNQ
text: Set upon six acres, the site includes a memorial square with 800 six-foot monuments to symbolize thousands of racial terror lynching victims in the United States and the counties and states where this terrorism took place.pic.twitter.com/dxBOSePhNQ

html: According to @eji_org, “More than 4400 African American men, women, and children were hanged, burned alive, shot, drowned, or beaten to death by white mobs between 1877 and 1950. Millions more fled the South as refugees from racial terrorism...”

html: Incredible news: in just two months, almost a quarter of a million Virginians have signed up for Medicaid expansion. This is what happens when we put policy before politics. Find out if you're eligible for medicaid expansion today http://www.coverva.org

html: In 2015, the #CharlestonLoophole allowed a man with a criminal background to buy a gun without a complete background check. He used that gun to murder 9 innocents at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC. Today, the House voted to close that loophole. #EndGunViolencepic.twitter.com/j78uwTlhRQ
text:
In 2015, the #CharlestonLoophole allowed a man with a criminal background to buy a gun without a complete background check.

He used that gun to murder 9 innocents at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC.

Today, the House voted to close that loophole. 

#EndGunViolencepic.twitter.com/j78uwTlhRQ

html: From Essex Junction, Vermont: "Some of us are young professionals just starting out... Some of us are the only source of income for our young families. Some of us are veterans. Now that we're facing work without pay, I worry for my colleagues' health, physical and mental."
text: From Essex Junction, Vermont: "Some of us are young professionals just starting out... Some of us are the only source of income for our young families. Some of us are veterans. Now that we're facing work without pay, I worry for my colleagues' health, physical and mental."

html: From Manassas, Virginia: "We have already been punished by this situation; we had to entirely give up our Christmas and I had to look at my kids and ask that they hold their money so we could buy food if this shutdown continued."
text: From Manassas, Virginia: "We have already been punished by this situation; we had to entirely give up our Christmas and I had to look at my kids and ask that they hold their money so we could buy food if this shutdown continued."

html: From Denver, Colorado: "I'm getting worried about my mortgage payment coming up, I barely managed to ensure my student loans are paid for this month, and now I have to worry about food and other bills."
text: From Denver, Colorado: "I'm getting worried about my mortgage payment coming up, I barely managed to ensure my student loans are paid for this month, and now I have to worry about food and other bills."

html: From Frederick, Maryland: "If the shutdown goes on much longer I will be forced to take money out of my kids' college funds and my retirement savings. That comes with penalities that I'll never get back."
text: From Frederick, Maryland: "If the shutdown goes on much longer I will be forced to take money out of my kids' college funds and my retirement savings. That comes with penalities that I'll never get back."

html: From Lithonia, Georgia: "Many of our elderly residents are in jeopardy of not receiving their much-needed food stamps if the government shutdown does not end by the end of January 2019. These necessary funds for food are for basic survival due to their low incomes."
text: From Lithonia, Georgia: "Many of our elderly residents are in jeopardy of not receiving their much-needed food stamps if the government shutdown does not end by the end of January 2019. These necessary funds for food are for basic survival due to their low incomes."

html: From Rockville, Maryland: "I have a significant pre-existing condition and worry for not only my health but the financial security of our family."
text: From Rockville, Maryland: "I have a significant pre-existing condition and worry for not only my health but the financial security of our family."

html: One of my constituents, an air traffic controller from Leesburg, has worked 80 hours over the past two weeks and isn't getting paid a nickel on payday today.
